Utility package¶

JSON Utils Module¶

json_utils.py

Utility module to hold any json utility functions. Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

cp1.utils.json_utils.create_mdl_bandwidth_set(mdl_bandwidth_dict)¶

Constructs a MDLBandwidthSet object from bandwidth_dict. Use with file_to_json.

Parameters:mdl_bandwidth_dict (dict) – Output from file_to_json
Returns mdl_bandwidth_set:
 An MDLBandwidthSet instance constructed from the input.
cp1.utils.json_utils.file_to_json(file_path)¶

Deserializes json object in file into a Python object.

Parameters:file_path (str) – Database name.
Returns json_map:
 Return type varies based on input, should be dict

OrientDB Storage Module¶

orientdb_storage.py

Any helper functions that store data in OrientDB. Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

class cp1.utils.orientdb_storage.OrientDBStorage(database_name=None, config_file=None, orientdb_client=None)¶

Bases: cp1.utils.orientdb_retrieval.OrientDBRetrieval

delete_nodes_by_class(clazz)¶

Deletes all nodes of given class type.

Parameters:clazz (str) – Class type to delete.
update_bandwidth(bandwidth_rates)¶

Modifies the Value field of a ServiceLevelProfile’s Rate vertex.

Parameters:bandwidth_rates (list) – New Value to update Rate with.
update_schedule(schedule)¶

Deletes existing TxOp nodes in database. Stores the list of TxOp nodes found in schedule.

Parameters:schedule (dict<str, List[MDLTxOp]>) – An instance of Schedule
